pr_title: [RW-5148][risk=no] Fix user creation via directory service

timeline.message: Fix user creation via directory service.

timeline.bodyText: Can you make it "full GSuite email address" so it's more foolproof?
timeline.author: jaycarlton
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -5024,7 +5024,9 @@ definitions:
         type: integer
         format: int64
       username:
-        description: researchallofus username
+        description: 'The username prefix, e.g. "gjordan". Note that this is different
+          from the use of "username" elsewhere in the RW codebase, where username represents
+          the full email address.'

timeline.bodyText: To make the errors or debug info clearer, I'd make this look more like a domain, e.g. "bobby.com".
timeline.author: jaycarlton

replies.bodyText: Yep, that was copy-pasta mistake, done.
replies.author: gjuggler
